attributes.action: REMOVE RATES FOR EMPTY BUSINESS PREMISES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ABOLISH RATES FOR EMPTY BUSINESS PREMISES. In the current state of this run down economy, how does the Government expect empty business premises to be in a position to pay full business rates without any income to pay it from? This is simply a way of getting the government coffers paid by further squeezing those already in trouble from this ruined economy.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "REMOVE RATES FOR EMPTY BUSINESS PREMISES."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20412


Prime Minister's Office
